file title: 	Mean Temperature of Wettest Quarter 
data type: 	integer
file type: 	binary
columns:	2160
rows:	1080
ref. system:	lat/long
ref. units:	deg
min. X:	-180
max. X:	180
min. Y:	-90
max. Y:	90
pos'n error:	unknown
resolution:	0.1666667
min. value:	
max. value:	
value units:	percentage
value error:	see error file
flag value:	255
flag def'n:	none
